description: I had issues with pulse effects not having an equalizer and this just replaced it for me!
It doesn't have as many options as pulseeffects, but it does its job very well

I hate when it creates an new audio output device for outputing the equalized audio signal (Maybe trying to implement it to work directly from the default audio you're using?). 
But after all I like it and it does its job very well. Even though it creates an new autdio output device for it.
